Sadin.Name: תקציב מול בפועל
Sadin.Versions: SELECT DISTINCT p0v_GIRSA.VERSION, p0v_GIRSA.GirsaOrd, p0v_GIRSA.CategoryID FROM p2v_BvARepT LEFT OUTER JOIN p0v_GIRSA ON p0v_GIRSA.CategoryID = p2v_BvARepT.VersionCategoryID WHERE (p0v_GIRSA.VERSION IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY p0v_GIRSA.GirsaOrd

Query.Txt: Select y.[תקציב_-_1] + ' ' + ColSource as Col , dbo.SHERUT_besqxl.[שירות_-_1], dbo.SHERUT_besqxl.[שירות_-_2],[סדר_שורות_שירות], (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as a From dbo.BUDGET_besqxl Where y.[תקציב_-_1]=[תקציב_-_1] And [תקציב_-_2] is null And [תקציב_-_3] is null) * 1000 + ColIndex As Ord ,sSum From (SELECT VersionCategoryID,FrameCategoryID,BudgetCategoryID,[SB] As sSum, 'תקציב' as ColSource,1 as ColIndex FROM [p2v_BvARepT] as x Where x.VersionCategoryID = @VersionCategoryID1 And x.DateB = @DateB UNION ALL SELECT VersionCategoryID,FrameCategoryID,BudgetCategoryID,[SA] As sSum, 'בפועל' as ColSource,2 as ColIndex FROM [p2v_BvARepT] as x Where x.VersionCategoryID = @VersionCategoryID1 And x.DateB = @DateB UNION ALL SELECT VersionCategoryID,FrameCategoryID,BudgetCategoryID,isnull([sa],0) - isnull([Sb],0) As sSum, 'הפרש' as ColSource,3 asColIndex FROM [p2v_BvARepT] as x Where x.VersionCategoryID = @VersionCategoryID1 And x.DateB = @DateB) as x LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.p0v_GIRSA ON x.VersionCategoryID = dbo.p0v_GIRSA.CategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SHERUT_besqxl ON x.FrameCategoryID = dbo.SHERUT_besqxl.CategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.BUDGET_besqxl as y ON x.BudgetCategoryID = y.CategoryID Where [שירות_-_1] != 'חברה'

Sadin.Name: השוואת תקציב
Sadin.Versions: SELECT [גרסה_-_1] + char(183) + [גרסה_-_2] AS Version, [CategoryID] FROM [GIRSA_besqxl] Where [גרסה_-_2] is not null ORDER BY [סדר_שורות_גרסה] DESC

Query.Txt:
Select 'לקוחות ' + (Select gx1.[גרסה_-_1] + ' ' + gx1.[גרסה_-_2] From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case gx.CategoryID when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) AS ColH, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 'מטה' Else 'מסגרות' End As Sherut_0, sx.[שירות_-_1] sherut_1, sx.[שירות_-_2] as Sherut_2, (Select round(Avg(isnull(x,0)),0) as xx From (select cast(tvd.val as float) as x ,tvd.versionCategoryID,FrameCategoryID,TermID from vTermVal_Date_C as tvd)as yy where yy.termid=tl.TermID and yy.versioncategoryid = gx.CategoryID and yy.FrameCategoryID=sx.CategoryID) as sSum, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 1 Else 0 End * 1000 + sx.סדר_שורות_שירות as roword, (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as x From Budget_besqxl AS bx WHERE bx.CategoryID=48) * 100000 + case when gx.CategoryID IN (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID3) then 20000 else 10000 end + (Select gx1.סדר_שורות_גרסה From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case gx.CategoryID when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) * 10 + 1 as ColOrd From SHERUT_besqxl as sx left outer join Term_List tl on tl.Term=sx.לקוחות left outer join GIRSA_besqxl gx on gx.CategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID2,@VersionCategoryID3,@VersionCategoryID4) Where exists(Select * from BEBudget where FrameCategoryID=sx.categoryid and VersionCategoryID=gx.categoryid) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And sx.[שירות_-_1] != 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' And sx.isparent is null And TermID!=72 group by sx.CategoryID,gx.[גרסה_-_1],gx.[גרסה_-_2],sx.[שירות_-_1],sx.[שירות_-_2],sx.סדר_שורות_שירות,gx.סדר_שורות_גרסה,termid,gx.CategoryID UNION ALL
Select distinct '% מקדם בטחון ' As ColH, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 'מטה' Else 'מסגרות' End As Sherut_0, sx.[שירות_-_1] sherut_1, sx.[שירות_-_2] as Sherut_2, (Select x as xx From (select cast(tvd.val as float) as x ,tvd.versionCategoryID,FrameCategoryID,TermID from vTermVal_NoDate as tvd where tvd.termid=35 and tvd.versioncategoryid = gx.CategoryID and tvd.FrameCategoryID=sx.CategoryID)as yy) as sSum, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 1 Else 0 End * 1000 + sx.סדר_שורות_שירות as roword, (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as x From Budget_besqxl AS bx WHERE bx.CategoryID=204) * 200000 + gx.סדר_שורות_גרסה * 10 + 3 as ColOrd From SHERUT_besqxl as sx left outer join Term_List tl on tl.Term=sx.לקוחות left outer join GIRSA_besqxl gx on gx.CategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1) Where sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And sx.isparent is null UNION ALL
Select bb.[תקציב - 1] + ' ' + (Select gx1.[גרסה_-_1] + ' ' + gx1.[גרסה_-_2] From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) AS ColH, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 'מטה' Else 'מסגרות' End As Sherut_0, sx.[שירות_-_1] sherut_1, sx.[שירות_-_2] as Sherut_2, Case bb.[תקציב - 1] When 'הכנסות' then 1 - isnull((Select top 1 CAST(val as float) as xxx From vTermVal_Nodate Where TermID=35 And FrameCategoryID=sx.CategoryID And Val IS not null),0) Else 1 End * bb.סכום as sSum , Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 1 Else 0 End * 1000 + sx.סדר_שורות_שירות as roword, (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as x From Budget_besqxl AS bx WHERE bx.[תקציב_-_1]=bb.[תקציב - 1]) * 100000 + case when bb.versioncategoryid IN (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID3) then 20000 else 10000 end + (Select gx1.סדר_שורות_גרסה From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) * 10 as ColOrd From BEBudget as bb left outer join GIRSA_besqxl as gx on gx.CategoryID=bb.VersionCategoryID left outer join SHERUT_besqxl sx on sx.CategoryID=bb.FrameCategoryID Where bb.[מספר תבנית] < 100000000 AND bb.VersionCategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID2,@VersionCategoryID3,@VersionCategoryID4) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And bb.[תקציב - 1] not in (@Budget_1) UNION ALL
Select bb.[תקציב - 1] + ' % גידול.' As ColH, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 'מטה' Else 'מסגרות' End As Sherut_0, sx.[שירות_-_1] sherut_1, sx.[שירות_-_2] as Sherut_2, bb.סכום as sSum , Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 1 Else 0 End * 1000 + sx.סדר_שורות_שירות as roword, (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as x From Budget_besqxl AS bx WHERE bx.[תקציב_-_1]=bb.[תקציב - 1]) * 100000 + 20000 + (Select gx1.סדר_שורות_גרסה From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) * 10 + 2 as ColOrd From BEBudget as bb left outer join GIRSA_besqxl as gx on gx.CategoryID=bb.VersionCategoryID left outer join SHERUT_besqxl sx on sx.CategoryID=bb.FrameCategoryID Where bb.VersionCategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And bb.[תקציב - 1] = 'הכנסות' UNION ALL
Select bb.[תקציב - 1] + ' % מהכנסות ' + (Select gx1.[גרסה_-_1] + ' ' + gx1.[גרסה_-_2] From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) + Case When bb.VersionCategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID3) then '.' Else '' End AS ColH, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 'מטה' Else 'מסגרות' End As Sherut_0, sx.[שירות_-_1] sherut_1, sx.[שירות_-_2] as Sherut_2, bb.סכום as sSum , Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 1 Else 0 End * 1000 + sx.סדר_שורות_שירות as roword, (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as x From Budget_besqxl AS bx WHERE bx.[תקציב_-_1]=bb.[תקציב - 1]) * 100000 + case when bb.versioncategoryid IN (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID3) then 20000 else 10000 end + (Select gx1.סדר_שורות_גרסה From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) * 10 + 2 as ColOrd From BEBudget as bb left outer join GIRSA_besqxl as gx on gx.CategoryID=bb.VersionCategoryID left outer join SHERUT_besqxl sx on sx.CategoryID=bb.FrameCategoryID Where bb.VersionCategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID2,@VersionCategoryID3,@VersionCategoryID4) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And bb.[תקציב - 1] not in (@Budget_1) And bb.[תקציב - 1] != 'הכנסות' UNION ALL
Select ' רווח תפעולי ' + (Select gx1.[גרסה_-_1] + ' ' + gx1.[גרסה_-_2] From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) AS ColH, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 'מטה' Else 'מסגרות' End As Sherut_0, sx.[שירות_-_1] sherut_1, sx.[שירות_-_2] as Sherut_2, bb.סכום as sSum , Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 1 Else 0 End * 1000 + sx.סדר_שורות_שירות as roword, (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as x From Budget_besqxl AS bx WHERE bx.CategoryID=208) * 100000 + case when bb.versioncategoryid IN (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID3) then 20000 else 10000 end + (Select gx1.סדר_שורות_גרסה From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) * 10 as ColOrd From BEBudget as bb left outer join GIRSA_besqxl as gx on gx.CategoryID=bb.VersionCategoryID left outer join SHERUT_besqxl sx on sx.CategoryID=bb.FrameCategoryID Where bb.VersionCategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID2,@VersionCategoryID3,@VersionCategoryID4) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And sx.isparent is null UNION ALL
Select 'רווח תפעולי % גידול ' + (Select gx1.[גרסה_-_1] + ' ' + gx1.[גרסה_-_2] From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) + Case When bb.VersionCategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID3) then '.' Else '' End AS ColH, Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 'מטה' Else 'מסגרות' End As Sherut_0, sx.[שירות_-_1] sherut_1, sx.[שירות_-_2] as Sherut_2, bb.סכום as sSum , Case sx.[שירות_-_1] When 'הנהלת בית אקשטיין' Then 1 Else 0 End * 1000 + sx.סדר_שורות_שירות As RowOrd, (Select min(סדר_שורות_תקציב) as x From Budget_besqxl AS bx WHERE bx.CategoryID=208) * 100000 + case when bb.versioncategoryid IN (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID3) then 20000 else 10000 end + (Select gx1.סדר_שורות_גרסה From GIRSA_besqxl As Gx1 Where Gx1.CategoryID= Case bb.Versioncategoryid when @VersionCategoryID1 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID2 then @VersionCategoryID2 When @VersionCategoryID3 then @VersionCategoryID1 When @VersionCategoryID4 then @VersionCategoryID2 End) * 10 + 2 as ColOrd From BEBudget as bb left outer join GIRSA_besqxl as gx on gx.CategoryID=bb.VersionCategoryID left outer join SHERUT_besqxl sx on sx.CategoryID=bb.FrameCategoryID Where bb.VersionCategoryID in (@VersionCategoryID1,@VersionCategoryID2,@VersionCategoryID3,@VersionCategoryID4) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And sx.[שירות_-_1] not in (@Service_1) And sx.isparent is null
